title: Ba Ai Mou Qing - Novel Updates
tags: Childcare   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Inferiority Complex   Modern Day
author: Xin Xin Xiang Rong   欣欣向荣
description: Ji Qing held a crush for Jin Cheng for 10 years, but after only 1 year of married life, she felt that she couldn’t go on anymore. After their divorce did Jin Cheng realize how much she meant to him, what will he do to win her back?>
